title: Suspect identified in fatal July 2 shooting in Indianapolis
content:
Police have obtained an arrest warrant in a July homicide investigation.
Steven Eldridge, 21, is facing charges of murder and three counts of attempted murder for his alleged involvement in the murder of 20-year-old Tavin Yeakey.
The shooting happened the night of July 2 in the 500 block of Lynn Street on the near west side of Indianapolis. Officers found Yeakey suffering from a gunshot wound to the head. He later died at Eskenazi Hospital.
Three other people showed up at Eskenazi Hospital on their own with gunshot wounds to their legs. They told police they were also shot on Lynn Street.
Eldridge is expected to be served with the warrants in Kentucky, where he is being held in federal custody on an unrelated arrest.
